bx_pay_money

out_ticket_type
order_status
,create_time

train_no
from_city
to_city

to_time
travel_time
seat_type
ext_seat
user_name
)

STR_TO_DATE(#travel_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d')

#user_name:VARCHAR#
)

insert into inner_orderinfo_returnnotify
order_id, create_time,
notify_status
notify_time
notify_num
notify_finish_time
fail_reason
plat_order_id
order_status
)
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#, NOW(),
#notify_status:VARCHAR#
STR_TO_DATE(#notify_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
#notify_num:INTEGER#
STR_TO_DATE(#notify_finish_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
#fail_reason:VARCHAR#
#plat_order_id:VARCHAR#
#order_status:VARCHAR#
)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE inner_orderinfo_returnnotify SET order_status=#order_status:VARCHAR#
fail_reason=#fail_reason:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.order_id,hc.order_status,hc.train_no,hc.from_city,hc.to_city,DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%H:%i') AS from_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.to_time,'%H:%i') AS to_time,DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS travel_time,hc.out_ticket_billno, DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, hc.user_id AS user_id, DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, hc.seat_type,hc.ticket_pay_money,hc.bx_pay_money, hc.ps_pay_money,hc.pay_money,hc.buy_money,hc.out_ticket_type, hc.can_refund,hc.ext_seat,hc.pay_seq AS pay_seq,hc.plat_order_id AS plat_order_id, hc.refund_url AS refund_url,hc.ticket_url AS ticket_url FROM inner_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo SET pay_seq=#pay_seq:VARCHAR#, plat_order_id=#plat_order_id:VARCHAR#, order_status=#order_status:VARCHAR#, pay_time=STR_TO_DATE(#pay_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), refund_url=#refund_url:VARCHAR#, ticket_url=#ticket_url:VARCHAR# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
UPDATE inner_orderinfo_refundstream SET eop_refund_seq=#plat_refund_seq:VARCHAR#, refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND refund_seq=#refund_seq:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT por.refund_seq,por.refund_money FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream por WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE inner_orderinfo_refundstream SET plat_refund_seq=#plat_refund_seq:VARCHAR#, actual_refund_money=#actual_refund_money:VARCHAR#
refund_time=STR_TO_DATE(#refund_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND refund_seq=#refund_seq:VARCHAR#
UPDATE inner_orderinfo_returnnotify SET notify_status=#notify_status:VARCHAR#, notify_num=notify_num+1, notify_time=NOW() WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND plat_order_id=#plat_order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT por.order_id AS order_id,por.create_time AS create_time,por.notify_status AS notify_status,por.plat_order_id AS plat_order_id,por.order_status AS order_status FROM inner_orderinfo_returnnotify por WHERE (notify_status='00' OR notify_status='11') AND notify_num <10 AND (order_status='44' OR order_status='45') AND order_id like 'PAY%' ORDER BY create_time ASC LIMIT 0,10
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo_returnnotify SET notify_num=10 WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND plat_order_id=#plat_order_id:VARCHAR#
UPDATE inner_orderinfo_returnnotify SET notify_status='22',notify_finish_time=NOW() WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND plat_order_id=#plat_order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.order_id, hc.ps_billno, hc.ps_company, hc.pay_money, hc.buy_money, hc.ps_status, hc.link_name, hc.link_phone, hc.link_address, hc.link_mail FROM cp_orderinfo_ps hc WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp.order_id,cp.cp_id,cp.seat_type,cp.pay_money AS cp_pay_money,CONVERT(cp.buy_money,CHAR) AS cp_buy_money,cp.train_box,cp.seat_no, CONVERT(cp.ticket_type,CHAR) AS ticket_type,cp.user_name,CONVERT(cp.ids_type,CHAR) AS ids_type,cp.user_ids, bx.bx_id,bx.bx_billno,bx.bx_code,bx.pay_money AS bx_pay_money,p.product_id,p.name AS bx_name FROM inner_orderinfo_cp cp LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo_bx bx ON cp.order_id=bx.order_id AND cp.cp_id=bx.cp_id LEFT JOIN inner_productinfo p ON bx.product_id=p.product_id WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.order_id, hc.order_status, hc.from_city, hc.to_city, hc.ticket_pay_money, hc.bx_pay_money, hc.ps_pay_money, hc.pay_money, DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, CONVERT(hc.out_ticket_type,CHAR) AS out_ticket_type, NOW()>DATE_ADD(hc.from_time, INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AS is_deadline, IFNULL(hc.refund_deadline_ignore,'0') AS deadline_ignore,hc.can_refund,v.refund_status FROM inner_orderinfo hc LEFT JOIN inner_refund_view v ON hc.order_id=v.order_id WHERE hc.order_status <> '00' and hc.user_id=#user_id:VARCHAR#
hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.out_ticket_billno=#out_ticket_billno:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY hc.create_time DESC LIMIT #everyPagefrom:Integer#, #pageSize:Integer#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM inner_orderinfo hc LEFT JOIN inner_refund_view v ON hc.order_id=v.order_id WHERE hc.order_status <> '00' and hc.user_id=#user_id:VARCHAR#
hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.out_ticket_billno=#out_ticket_billno:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
insert inner_orderinfo_refund
order_id
refund_create_time
refund_memo
refund_money
refund_purl
refund_status
)
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#
now()
#refund_memo:VARCHAR#
#refund_money:VARCHAR#
#refund_purl:VARCHAR#
#refund_status:VARCHAR#
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo set order_status='55' WHERE order_id=#orderid:VARCHAR#

UPDATE inner_orderinfo SET order_status=#order_status:VARCHAR#
pay_time=NOW()
WHERE order_id=#asp_order_id:VARCHAR#
order_status=#old_status:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.order_id, hc.order_name, CONVERT(hc.ticket_pay_money,CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money, CONVERT(hc.bx_pay_money, CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, hc.from_city, hc.to_city, DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as from_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.to_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as to_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as travel_time ,hc.train_no,CONVERT(hc.seat_type,CHAR) as seat_type,CONVERT(hc.out_ticket_type,CHAR) as out_ticket_type,hc.ext_seat FROM inner_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_status='11' AND hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
SELECT CONVERT(hc.bx_pay_money, CHAR) AS bx_pay_money FROM inner_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_status='11' AND hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp.cp_id,cp.order_id,cp.user_name,CONVERT(cp.ticket_type,CHAR) as ticket_type, CONVERT(cp.ids_type,CHAR) as ids_type,cp.user_ids,CONVERT(cp.seat_type,CHAR) as seat_type, CONVERT(cp.pay_money,CHAR) as pay_money FROM inner_orderinfo_cp cp WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo hc SET hc.timeout = #timeout:VARCHAR# WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.order_id,hc.user_id as user_id FROM inner_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_status='11' AND hc.create_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY hc.create_time DESC LIMIT 0, 20

SELECT hc.from_city,hc.to_city,DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%m月%d日%H:%i')AS from_time,hc.train_no, ps.link_name,ps.link_phone FROM inner_orderinfo hc LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo_ps ps ON hc.order_id=ps.order_id WHERE hc.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR#
SELECT cp.train_box,cp.seat_no,cp.user_name FROM inner_orderinfo_cp cp WHERE cp.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE inner_orderinfo_refund SET refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR#
refund_time=STR_TO_DATE(#eop_refund_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
WHERE order_id=#asp_order_id:VARCHAR# AND refund_status=#old_refund_status:VARCHAR#
UPDATE cp_orderinfo_bx b SET b.bx_status=0 WHERE b.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONVERT(ticket_pay_money-buy_money,CHAR) AS refund_money, order_id, CONVERT(IFNULL(refund_total,0),CHAR) AS refund_total FROM inner_orderinfo WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND order_status='44' AND ticket_pay_money-buy_money>0
sqlMap.insert:
insert into inner_orderinfo_differ
order_id
eop_order_id
plat_refund_seq
refund_money
,create_time
differ_status
,notify_num )
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#
#eop_order_id:VARCHAR#
#plat_refund_seq:VARCHAR#
#refund_money:VARCHAR#
,NOW()
#differ_status:VARCHAR#
,0 )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM inner_orderinfo_differ d WHERE d.refund_seq=#refund_seq:VARCHAR#
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(h.from_time, INTERVAL 3 HOUR),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as from_time FROM inner_orderinfo h WHERE h.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
SELECT d.differ_status,CONVERT(d.refund_money,CHAR) AS refund_money FROM inner_orderinfo_differ d WHERE d.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.order_id, hc.order_status, hc.from_city, hc.to_city, hc.ticket_pay_money, hc.bx_pay_money, hc.ps_pay_money, hc.pay_money, DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, CONVERT(hc.out_ticket_type,CHAR) AS out_ticket_type, r.refund_status, NOW()>DATE_ADD(hc.from_time, INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AS is_deadline, IFNULL(hc.refund_deadline_ignore,'0') AS deadline_ignore, DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS travel_time,hc.train_no FROM inner_orderinfo hc LEFT JOIN inner_orderinfo_refund r ON hc.order_id=r.order_id WHERE hc.order_status <> '00' and hc.user_id=#user_id:VARCHAR# ORDER BY hc.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,3
SELECT CONVERT(IFNULL(h.refund_total,0),CHAR) AS refund_total,e.eop_order_id FROM inner_orderinfo h LEFT JOIN hc_order_eop e ON h.order_id=e.order_id WHERE h.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE inner_orderinfo hc SET hc.refund_total=#refund_total:VARCHAR#
hc.can_refund=#can_refund:VARCHAR#
WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into inner_orderinfo_refundstream
order_id
plat_refund_seq
refund_type
cp_id
refund_seq
refund_money
,create_time
refund_purl
user_remark
refund_status
refund_percent
,notify_num,inner_channel )
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#
#plat_refund_seq:VARCHAR#
#refund_type:VARCHAR#
#cp_id:VARCHAR#
#refund_seq:VARCHAR#
#refund_money:DECIMAL#
,NOW()
#refund_purl:VARCHAR#
#user_remark:VARCHAR#
#refund_status:VARCHAR#
#refund_percent:VARCHAR#
,0,'19pay' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream hc WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND hc.cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR# AND hc.refund_type='1' AND hc.refund_status <> '55'

SELECT rs.order_id,rs.cp_id,rs.refund_type,rs.refund_status, CONVERT(refund_money, CHAR) as refund_money,rs.our_remark,rs.user_remark, DATE_FORMAT(rs.refund_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS refund_time FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream rs WHERE rs.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# ORDER BY rs.refund_type, rs.create_time DESC

SELECT a.num-b.num AS left_count FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM inner_orderinfo_cp WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#) AS a,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND refund_type='1' and refund_status <> '55') AS b
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR# AND refund_type='1' AND refund_status='55'
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONVERT(rs.stream_id,CHAR) AS stream_id,rs.order_id,rs.refund_type,rs.cp_id,rs.refund_seq AS refund_seq, CONVERT(rs.refund_money, CHAR) AS refund_money FROM inner_orderinfo_refundstream rs WHERE (rs.refund_status='11' OR (rs.refund_status='22' AND DATE_ADD(rs.notify_time, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)<=NOW())) AND rs.refund_plan_time <= NOW() AND rs.notify_num <5 AND order_id like 'PAY%' ORDER BY rs.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,10
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo_refundstream SET notify_time=NOW(), notify_num=notify_num+1, refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR# WHERE stream_id=#stream_id:INTEGER# AND refund_seq=#refund_seq:VARCHAR# AND order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

UPDATE inner_orderinfo_refundstream SET refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR#
refund_time=STR_TO_DATE(#eop_refund_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
eop_refund_seq=#plat_refund_seq:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
stream_id=#stream_id:INTEGER#
refund_seq=#refund_seq:VARCHAR#
refund_status=#old_refund_status:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(h.from_time, INTERVAL 4 HOUR),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS from_time_3, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(h.from_time, INTERVAL 24 HOUR),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS from_time_24, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(h.from_time, INTERVAL 48 HOUR),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS from_time_48 FROM inner_orderinfo h WHERE h.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into inner_orderinfo_refundstream
order_id
eop_order_id
refund_type
cp_id
refund_seq
eop_refund_seq
refund_money
create_time
refund_time
refund_purl
our_remark
refund_plan_time
refund_12306_seq
refund_status
refund_percent
opt_person
,notify_num )
values

#refund_type:VARCHAR#
#cp_id:VARCHAR#
#refund_seq:VARCHAR#
#plat_refund_seq:VARCHAR#
#refund_money:DECIMAL#
STR_TO_DATE(#create_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
STR_TO_DATE(#refund_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
#refund_purl:VARCHAR#
#our_remark:VARCHAR#
STR_TO_DATE(#refund_plan_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
#refund_12306_seq:VARCHAR#
#refund_status:VARCHAR#
#refund_percent:VARCHAR#
#opt_person:VARCHAR#
,0 )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo SET can_refund='0' WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.order_id, hc.order_name, CONVERT(hc.ticket_pay_money,CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money, CONVERT(hc.bx_pay_money, CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, hc.from_city, hc.to_city,DATE_FORMAT(hc.from_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as from_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.to_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as to_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as travel_time ,hc.train_no,CONVERT(hc.seat_type,CHAR) as seat_type,CONVERT(hc.out_ticket_type,CHAR) as out_ticket_type ,hc.ext_seat FROM inner_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_status='11' AND hc.timeout='1' AND hc.create_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY hc.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,5
sqlMap.update: UPDATE inner_orderinfo hc SET hc.timeout = #timeout:VARCHAR#, hc.order_status='22' WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and hc.timeout = '1' and hc.order_status='12'
sqlMap.insert:
insert into cp_orderinfo_bxfp
order_id
fp_receiver
fp_phone
fp_zip_code
fp_address
,create_time )
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#
#fp_receiver:VARCHAR#
#fp_phone:VARCHAR#
#fp_zip_code:VARCHAR#
#fp_address:VARCHAR#
,NOW() )
sqlMap.update:
update inner_orderinfo set
plat_order_id = #request_id:VARCHAR#
pay_seq = #pay_no:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
